title: Games Girls Play, The Bunny Caper 1974 Christina Hart, Eunice Black, Harry Towb, Bobby Sparrow, Jill Damas, Oliver Gilbert, Ric Young, Sarah Brackett, Erin Geraghty + Jack Arnold

sources.title: Games Girls Play, The Bunny Caper 1974 Christina Hart, Eunice Black, Harry Towb, Bobby Sparrow, Jill Damas, Oliver Gilbert, Ric Young, Sarah Brackett, Erin Geraghty + Jack Arnold
sources.description: Back in the 80's there were lots of "save something with tits" movies. Someone would inherit a bar, restaurant, car wash or drive in and the only way to keep it solvent was to have a wet t-shirt contest. Fred Olen Ray and Richard Gabi made tons on money with that formula. In The Bunny Caper, effervescent Christina Hart's character works to further her father's career using the same tactic
